name: Cute Knight Kingdom (itch)
description:
Is destiny what you find, or what finds you?

Upon your 18th birthday, you discover that your loving parents are actually your adoptive parents. With their blessings, you set out to investigate your past, and set the stage for your future.

Travel the kingdom to meet new friends, find treasure, and encounter monsters! Choose your outfit, jobs, and classes to raise the skills that you need for success. 

Dozens of possible careers are determined by how you play the game - there's no one way to win! You could become a hero, find true love, discover the truth of your origins... or embrace villainy as an evil warlord. It's all up to you!
